tool_description: Validates and preprocesses raw dimensional measurement data for uncertainty analysis, checking for outliers, missing values, and data quality issues.

measurement_unit.description: Unit of measurement (e.g., mm, μm, inch)

outlier_threshold.description: Standard deviations threshold for outlier detection (1-5)

error_messages: Insufficient data points: Minimum 3 measurements required for statistical analysis.
Invalid measurement unit: Unit must be a recognized dimensional unit (mm, μm, inch, m, etc.).
Outlier threshold out of range: Must be between 1 and 5 standard deviations.
Non-numeric measurement values: All measurement values must be numbers.
Excessive outliers detected: More than 20% of data points are outliers, check measurement process.
usage: Provide measurement_values array and measurement_unit. Optionally set outlier_threshold. Tool validates data quality and identifies potential issues before uncertainty analysis.

validated_data.description: Cleaned measurement data with outliers flagged

data_quality_score.description: Quality score from 0-100 based on data consistency

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: PASSED, WARNING, or FAILED
